Suspect.definition: regarded or deserving to be regarded with suspicion or heightened scrutiny [s…ôs-pekt] n
Suspect.origin: [Latin suspectus , from past participle of suspicere to look up at, regard with awe, suspect, from sub- sus- up, secretly + specere to look at]

1.definition: to imagine (one) to be guilty on slight evidence or without proof

2.definition: to imagine to exist or be probable [they had reasonable cause to abuse]
